description: M.J Drywall Mesh Tape offers dependable crack reinforcement and drywall joint taping, available in both 48mm and 96mm widths to suit various project needs. Each roll is 90 metres long, giving you extended coverage for home renovations, plasterboard installations, or contractor projects. The strong self-adhesive backing ensures easy application without slipping or curling, while the white fibreglass mesh reinforces joints and resists tearing or warping after application. Choose the 48mm tape for standard joint taping or fine repair work. Select the 96mm tape when extra width is needed for corners, ceilings, or pre-decoration crack control. Suitable for: Plasterboard joints Wall and ceiling crack repairs Gypsum board finishing New construction and renovation Trust M.J for quality, performance, and ease of use‚Äîprofessional results with every roll.
